Peer Platform Documentation

Peer Platform Documentation

Welcome to the Peer Platform documentation site!

Our platform empowers teams to:

  • Create and configure new medical/clinical documents (e.g., CSR, Narratives, Protocols, Plain Language Summaries, etc.)
  • Build & Configure documents (done by the Peer team initially)
  • Allow customers and medical writers to edit and review using advanced AI-assisted features (chat-based editing, manual edits, and data traceability)
  • Finalize and export the completed documents in multiple formats

Quick Navigation

  1. Getting Started
  2. Creating a New Document
  3. Editing and Review
  4. Export and Finalization
  5. FAQ

Using This Documentation

  1. Set Up
    Learn basic requirements and log in to the platform in Getting Started.

  2. Create New Documents
    Understand the initial “Build & Config” phase (handled by Peer) and see how to add your data sources in Creating a New Document.

  3. Edit and Review
    Explore the powerful AI-assisted editing tools, chat workflows, and more in Editing and Review.

  4. Finalize
    Learn how to export your finished document (with auto-inserted hyperlinks and abbreviations) in Export and Finalization.

  5. Get Answers
    Refer to the FAQ or contact our support team.
